headline.print_headline: Ackman Urges Allergan Board to 'Wake Up' on Valeant Talks
headline.main: Ackman Urges Allergan Board to 'Wake Up' on Valeant Talks

lead_paragraph: After months of staying largely silent on a deal he is trying to broker, billionaire William Ackman on Tuesday criticized Allergan Inc 's board of directors, urging them to "wake up" and at least listen to what potential purchaser Valeant Pharmaceuticals has to offer the Botox maker.
